sections.title: To Cancun
paragraphs: To find flights, we recommend Kayak or Hipmunk.

sections.title: From the Airport
paragraphs: Bus and taxis range from $20 USD to $70 USD.

sections.title: From Blue Bay Grand Esmeralda to Blue Diamond Riviera Maya and viceversa.
paragraphs: We will arrange transportation for guests staying at the Blue Bay Grand Esmeralda the day of the event.

sections.title: A Cancún
paragraphs: Para encontrar vuelos, te recomendamos Despegar o Expedia.

sections.title: Desde el Aeropuerto
paragraphs: Autobuses y taxis cuestan desde $300 hasta $1,000 pesos.

sections.title: Del Blue Bay Grand Esmeralda al Blue Diamond Riviera Maya y viceversa
paragraphs: Proveeremos transporte para los invitados hospedados en el Blue Bay Grand Esmeralda el día del evento.
